text: This is a list of hospitals in New York City, sorted by hospital name, with addresses and a brief description of their formation and development. Hospital names were obtained from these sources. A list of hospitals in New York State is also available. ==Hospitals== ===Manhattan=== ===The Bronx=== ===Brooklyn=== ===Queens=== ===Staten Island=== ==Closed hospitals== Includes former names of hospitals * Arthur C. Logan Memorial Hospital * Emanuel Unity Hospital * James Ewing Hospital * Misericordia Hospital, 531 East 86th Street, Manhattan, and 600 East 233rd Street, the Bronx. Opened on Staten Island in 1887, moved to 531 East 86th Street in Manhattan in 1889, moved 600 East 233rd Street in the Bronx in 1958, renamed Our Lady of Mercy Hospital in 1985, acquired by Montefiore Medical Center in 2008 and renamed as their North Division, then renamed the Wakefield Division of Montefiore.Documents of the Senate of the State of New York (1914), pp. 488-489. * Northwestern Dispensary * Tonsil Hospital * Western Dispensary for Women and Children ===Manhattan=== ===The Bronx=== ===Brooklyn=== ===Queens=== ===Staten Island=== ==References== ==External links== * * New York City New York City Category:New York City- related lists
title: List of hospitals in New York City
